## Analysing animal tracking data in R

This repo contains code for the 'Analysing animal tracking data in R' practical that forms part of BL5122: Current Issues in Biologging.

Please download the practical-guide.html file by clicking [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jamesgrecian/BL5122-dev/master/practical-guide.html)
